iti61:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti61:2.3: The eye of the flesh, the eye of clairvoyance, and the eye of wisdom.
iti61:3.1: “The eye of flesh, the clairvoyant eye,
iti61:3.4: were taught by the supreme person.
iti61:4.1: The arising of the eye of flesh
iti61:4.2: is the path to the clairvoyant eye.
iti61:5.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
